institutions.name: Bureau of Internal Revenue
institutions.description: Government agency responsible for tax collection in the Philippines

forms.title: Application for Registration for Self-Employed and Mixed Income Individuals, Estates and Trusts
forms.officialTitle: Application for Registration BIR Form No. 1901
forms.description: For Self-Employed (Single Proprietor/Professional), Mixed Income Individuals, Non-Resident Alien Engaged in Trade/Business, Estate and Trust

fields.label: DLN
fields.instructions: To be filled out by BIR

fields.label: TIN to be issued, if applicable
fields.instructions: To be filled out by BIR

fields.label: RDO Code
fields.instructions: For Taxpayer with Existing TIN - To be filled out by BIR

options.label: Mixed Income Earner – Compensation Income Earner & Professional
Mixed Income Earner – Compensation Income Earner & Single Proprietor
Mixed Income Earner – Compensation Income Earner, Single Proprietorship & Professional

fields.label: Municipality Code
fields.instructions: To be filled out by BIR

fields.label: Purpose of TIN Application
fields.instructions: To be filled out by BIR

fields.label: Identification Details
fields.instructions: government issued ID (e.g., passport, driver's license, company ID, etc.)

fields.label: Are you availing of the 8% income tax rate option in lieu of graduated income tax rates?
How much is your expected Annual Gross Sales (GS)?

options.label: Micro – GS is less than Three Million Pesos (P3M)
Small - GS is Three Million Pesos (P3M) to less than 20 Million Pesos (P20M)
Medium – GS is Twenty Million Pesos (P20M) to Less than One Billion Pesos (P1B)
Large – GS is One Billion Pesos (P1B) and above

fields.label: Spouse Name
fields.instructions: Last Name, First Name, Middle Name, Suffix

fields.label: Spouse Employer's Name
fields.instructions: If Individual, Last Name, First Name, Middle Name, Suffix. If Non-Individual Registered Name. Attach additional sheet/s, if necessary

fields.label: Relationship Name
fields.instructions: For Authorized Representative - If Individual (Last Name) (First Name) (Middle Name) (Suffix) (Nickname) - If Non-Individual (Registered Name)

fields.label: PSIC Code
fields.instructions: To be filled out by BIR

fields.label: Incentive Granted
fields.placeholder: e.g., Exempt from IT, VAT, etc.

fields.label: Facility Details
Facility Code
fields.instructions: To be filled out by BIR

options.label: RP - Real Property for Lease with No Sales Activity

fields.instructions: PP-Place of Production/Plant; SP-Storage Place; WH-Warehouse; SR-Showroom; GG-Garage; BT-Bus Terminal; RP-Real Property for Lease with No Sales Activity

fields.label: Tax Types
fields.instructions: this portion determines your tax liability/ies - To be filled out by BIR

types: On Interest Paid on Deposits and Yield on Deposits/Substitutes

fields.label: Do you intend to use BIR Printed Invoices?

sections.name: Part IX – For Employee with Two or More Employers (Multiple Employments) Within the Calendar Year

options.label: Successive Employments (With previous employer/s within the calendar year)
Concurrent Employments (With two or more employers at the same time within the calendar year)

fields.label: Previous/Concurrent Employers
fields.instructions: If successive, enter previous employer/s; if concurrent, enter secondary employer/s. Attach additional sheet/s, if necessary

fields.label: Declaration
fields.text: I declare, under the penalties of perjury, that this application has been made in good faith, verified by me and to the best of my knowledge and belief, is true and correct, pursuant to the provisions of the National Internal Revenue Code, as amended, and the regulations issued under the authority thereof. Further, I give my consent to the processing of my information as contemplated under the Data Privacy Act of 2012 (R.A. No. 10173) for legitimate and lawful purposes.

sections.name: Part X – Payment Order Form for New Business Registrant
sections.instructions: For BIR Payment Acceptance Only. Not to be filed in AABs

fields.label: Payment Details
fields.instructions: To be filled out by BIR-Revenue Collection Officer

businessRules.rule: If taxpayer_type includes 'professional', require PRC ID in identification_details
If eight_percent_tax_option is 'yes', validate that expected_annual_gross_sales is 'micro'

required: Any government-issued ID that shows the name, address and birthdate of the applicant
BIR Printed Invoices or Final clear sample of OWN Invoices
Death Certificate of the decedent (for Estate)
Special Power of Attorney if transacting through representative

fees.description: Loose Stamp/s to be affixed on the Certificate of Registration

fieldTypes.tin: Tax Identification Number with format validation
fieldTypes.name: Structured name fields
